message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's a fair deal for the first round.
Let's split it 55/45, it's a better deal than your 60/40 proposal
I understand you want a larger share, but my previous offer was already generous. Let's meet in the middle - 55/45.
I see we're getting closer, I'll compromise a bit, 52/48 is my new offer
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to go slightly lower than my last offer - 51/49. Time is running out, and this money is losing value with every passing round!
